.. _singularity_sif_info:

singularity sif info
--------------------

Display detailed information of object descriptors

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Display detailed information of object descriptors

::

  singularity sif info <descriptorid> <containerfile>

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for info

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - siftool is a program for Singularity Image Format (SIF) file manipulation
